attributes.action: ...force the Olympic organising committee to change the logo from the atocity they have come up with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The olympic logo is awful! It doesn't mean anything, it cost too much to produce, and doesn't represent the spirit of the games as it should! Any one of the alternative suggestions on the BBC website would be better - CHANGE IT BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
